name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
section_name: Learn about Democratic Republic of the Congo research and records.

choices.name: Learn how to find records for ancestors from the DRC.

text:
1. Read this page for an overview of resources in the DRC.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Democratic Republic of the Congo Genealogy

  2. Learn about civil registration in the DRC.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Democratic Republic of the Congo Civil Registration

  3. Learn about census records in the DRC.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Democratic Republic of the Congo Census

  4. Learn about church records in the DRC.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Democratic Republic of the Congo Church Records

  5. Learn about archives and libraries in the DRC.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Democratic Republic of the Archives and Libraries

  6. Use this French genealogical word list to help in your research.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: French Genealogical Word List

  7. Explore common DRC surnames on the Forebears site.
  8. Explore DRC cemetery records on the on the ☆BillionGraves site.
  9. Explore DRC cemetery records on the ☆Find A Grave site.
QUIKLinks

1. Explore the ☆Perry-Castaneda site for the DRC.
  2. Explore the ☆David Rumsey collection of DRC maps.
  3. Explore the ☆Old Maps Online site for DRC maps.
  4. Explore the ☆Atlas of the Democratic Republic of the Congo on the Wikipedia site.
  5. Explore the ☆Old Maps of Africa on the Wikipedia site.

name: Ghana
section_name: Learn about Ghana research and records.

choices.name: Learn how to find records for ancestors from Ghana.

text:
1. Read this page for an overview of resources in Ghana.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Ghana Genealogy

  2. Learn how to begin doing research in Ghana.

    ☆ How Do I Research My Ghanaian Ancestry?

  3. Here are some tips for working with family history in Ghana.

    ☆ BYU—Some Guidelines For Family Research in Ghana

  4. Learn about civil registration in Ghana.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Ghana Civil Registration

  5. Learn about census records in Ghana.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Ghana Census

  6. Learn about church records in Ghana.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Ghana Church Records

  7. Explore the Gold Coast Database site for genealogy resources (requires a free registration).
  8. Explore common Ghana surnames on the Forebears site.
  9. Explore Ghana cemetery records on the on the ☆BillionGraves site.
  10. Explore Ghana cemetery records on the ☆Find A Grave site.

  5. Explore the ☆Old Maps Online site for Ghana maps.
  6. Explore the ☆Atlas of Ghana on the Wikipedia site.
  7. Explore the ☆Old Maps of Africa on the Wikipedia site.

name: Nigeria
section_name: Learn about Nigeria research and records.

choices.name: Learn how to find records for ancestors from the Nigeria.

text:
1. Read this page for an overview of resources in Nigeria.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nigeria Genealogy

  2. Learn about civil registration in Nigeria.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nigeria Civil Registration

  3. Learn about church records in Nigeria.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nigeria Church Records

  4. Learn about colonial records in Nigeria.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nigeria Colonial Records

  5. Watch this case study for tracing Nigerian ancestry.

    ☆ RT—6% Nigerian: Tracing My Missing Nigerian Ancestor—23:31


  6. Learn about using records from the Church Missionary Society (CMS) Archives.

    ☆ RT—The Church Missionary Society (CMS) Archives: Searching for Your Nigerian Ancestor—28:01
Record Resources

1. Explore resources for Nigeria research on the Nigeria Family Record site.
  2. Explore common Nigeria surnames on the Forebears site.
  3. Explore Nigeria cemetery records on the on the ☆BillionGraves site.
  4. Explore Nigeria cemetery records on the ☆Find A Grave site.
